Post.title: Welcome to the 2025 Test Drive
Post.description: Start here to learn how we perform this assessment, the methodology, and how to explore the tool.

Post.title: 2025 Platform Winners
Post.description: See how each financial institution ranked overall compared to peers.

Post.title: 2025 Annual Report Has Just Been Published
Post.description: The Digital Business Banking annual report uses both data from qualitative surveys and insights from the Test Drive to give an up-to-date understanding of the current digital banking field.

Post.title: U.S. Bank Updates to Mobile App
Post.description: On November 20 2024, U.S. Bank released an updated app with new features, including the ability to create a savings goal, personalized financial insights, and the ability to apply for merchant services.

Post.title: Truist Savings Calculator
Post.description: A feature not offered in most platforms - Truist offers business customers a series of calculators on their mobile app that estimate dollars saved based on loan payment changes.

Post.title: Bank of America Now Has Account Aggregation in Banking Dashboard
Post.description: Bank of America business banking customers now have the ability to see their aggregate cash flow by linking external accounts to Bank of America’s Banking Dashboard.

Post.title: Chase’s Business Snapshot
Post.description: This year, Chase joined the leaders in offering cash flow analysis in their Business Snapshot tool.

Post.title: TD Bank’s New Checkout Page Feature
Post.description: TD Bank joined the cash flow game this spring with their new Business Dashboard. The dashboard operates off data taken from pre-existing accounting software, creating cash flow tracking, forecasting, benchmarking information, and insights.

Post.title: Bank of America Now Has Account Aggregation in Banking Dashboard
Post.description: Bank of America business banking customers now have the ability to see their aggregate cash flow by linking external accounts to Bank of America’s Banking Dashboard.

Post.title: Chase’s Business Snapshot
Post.description: This year, Chase joined the leaders in offering cash flow analysis in their Business Snapshot tool.

Post.title: TD Bank’s New Checkout Page Feature
Post.description: TD Bank joined the cash flow game this spring with their new Business Dashboard. The dashboard operates off data taken from pre-existing accounting software, creating cash flow tracking, forecasting, benchmarking information, and insights.

Post.title: Welcome to the New Test Drive Layout
Post.description: We are excited to share this updated tool with you. Although the format is different, the methodology remains the same as previous years.

Post.title: New TD Bank Business Dashboard
Post.description: TD Bank joined the cash flow game this spring with their new Business Dashboard. The dashboard operates off data taken from pre-existing accounting software, creating cash flow tracking, forecasting, benchmarking information, and insights.

Post.title: NorthOne’s Insights and Integrations
Post.description: NorthOne’s Insights and Integrations connects with platforms like Shopify and Amazon. Users can link accounts to receive payments and view cash flow snapshots from e-commerce platforms such as Amazon, Etsy, PayPal, Shopify, Stripe, and Square. This update includes a new logo and redesign.

Post.title: Truist Insights
Post.description: With Truist Insights, business customers can see snapshots of their cashflow, like spending trends, important events and flagged unusual activity, on both desktop and mobile platforms.

Post.title: TD Bank Tap-to-Pay
Post.description: With Truist Insights, business customers can see snapshots of their cashflow, like spending trends, important events and flagged unusual activity, on both desktop and mobile platforms.
